content:
COMPropertyInfo Class

In this Article

Enables JScript to communicate with an external COM property. This class is used by an external COM implementation to expose its objects to JScript because JScript needs a managed MemberInfo in order to bind to an external object.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("6A02951C-B129-4d26-AB92-B9CA19BDCA26")]
public sealed class COMPropertyInfo : System.Reflection.PropertyInfo, Microsoft.JScript.MemberInfoInitializer

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • MemberInfo
  • System.Reflection.PropertyInfo
  • COMPropertyInfo

Constructors summary

COMPropertyInfo()

Initializes a new instance of the COMPropertyInfo class.

Properties summary

Attributes

Gets the attributes that are associated with this property.
CanRead

Gets a value that indicates whether the property can be read.
CanWrite

Gets a value that indicates whether the property can be written to.
DeclaringType

Gets the type that declares this property.
MemberType

Gets the type of member that this property is. Identifies the type of class derived from MemberInfo that this class derives from.
Name

Gets the name of the external COM property that this object represents.
PropertyType

Gets the type of this property.
ReflectedType

Gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance through reflection.

Methods summary

GetAccessors(Boolean)

Gets an array whose elements contain the get and set accessors of the external COM property that this object represents.
GetCOMMemberInfo()

Gets a managed object that enables JScript to communicate with this external COM property.
GetCustomAttributes(Boolean)

Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this property.
GetCustomAttributes(Type,Boolean)

Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this property, searching only for attributes of the specified type.
GetGetMethod(Boolean)

Returns the get accessor for this property.
GetIndexParameters()

Returns an array of all the index parameters for the property.
GetSetMethod(Boolean)

Returns the set accessor for this property.
GetValue(Object,BindingFlags,Binder,Object[],CultureInfo)

Gets the value of the external COM property by using the COMMemberInfo that was specified to the crosoft.JScript.COMPropertyInfo.Initialize* method.
Initialize(String,COMMemberInfo)

Initializes the information that enables JScript to communicate with this external COM property.
IsDefined(Type,Boolean)

Determines whether the specified attribute type is attached to this property.
SetValue(Object,Object,BindingFlags,Binder,Object[],CultureInfo)

Sets the value of the external COM property by using the COMMemberInfo that was specified to the crosoft.JScript.COMPropertyInfo.Initialize* method.

Constructors

  • COMPropertyInfo()

    Initializes a new instance of the COMPropertyInfo class.

    public COMPropertyInfo ();

Properties

  • Attributes

    Gets the attributes that are associated with this property.

    public override System.Reflection.PropertyAttributes Attributes { get; }

    Property Value

    • PropertyAttributes
      PropertyAttributes
  • CanRead

    Gets a value that indicates whether the property can be read.

    public override bool CanRead { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true in all cases.

  • CanWrite

    Gets a value that indicates whether the property can be written to.

    public override bool CanWrite { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true in all cases.

  • DeclaringType

    Gets the type that declares this property.

    public override Type DeclaringType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      null, because the type that declares this property is an external COM object.

  • MemberType

    Gets the type of member that this property is. Identifies the type of class derived from MemberInfo that this class derives from.

    public override System.Reflection.MemberTypes MemberType { get; }

    Property Value

    • MemberTypes

      MemberTypes, because this class derives from PropertyInfo.

  • Name

    Gets the name of the external COM property that this object represents.

    public override string Name { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the external COM property that this object represents.

  • PropertyType

    Gets the type of this property.

    public override Type PropertyType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The type of Object.

  • ReflectedType

    Gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance through reflection.

    public override Type ReflectedType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      null, because this instance was not obtained through reflection.

Methods

  • GetAccessors(Boolean)

    Gets an array whose elements contain the get and set accessors of the external COM property that this object represents.

    public override System.Reflection.MethodInfo[] GetAccessors (bool nonPublic);

    Parameters

    • nonPublic
      Boolean

      true to include non-public accessors.

    Returns

    • MethodInfo[]

      A two-element array of MethodInfo objects that contains the get and set methods of this property.

  • GetCOMMemberInfo()

    Gets a managed object that enables JScript to communicate with this external COM property.

    public Microsoft.JScript.COMMemberInfo GetCOMMemberInfo ();

    Returns

    • COMMemberInfo

      A managed object that enables JScript to communicate with this external COM property.

  • GetCustomAttributes(Boolean)

    Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this property.

    public override object[] GetCustomAttributes (bool inherit);

    Parameters

    • inherit
      Boolean

      true to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.

    Returns

    • Object[]

      An array of FieldInfo objects that has zero elements.

  • GetCustomAttributes(Type,Boolean)

    Returns an array that contains the custom attributes that are attached to this property, searching only for attributes of the specified type.

    public override object[] GetCustomAttributes (Type t, bool inherit);

    Parameters

    • t
      Type

      The type of attribute to search for.

    • inherit
      Boolean

      true to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.

    Returns

    • Object[]

      An array of FieldInfo objects that has zero elements.

  • GetGetMethod(Boolean)

    Returns the get accessor for this property.

    public override System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetGetMethod (bool nonPublic);

    Parameters

    • nonPublic
      Boolean

      true to include non-public accessors.

    Returns

    • MethodInfo

      The get accessor for this property.

  • GetIndexParameters()

    Returns an array of all the index parameters for the property.

    public override System.Reflection.ParameterInfo[] GetIndexParameters ();

    Returns

    • ParameterInfo[]

      An array of ParameterInfo objects that has zero elements.

  • GetSetMethod(Boolean)

    Returns the set accessor for this property.

    public override System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetSetMethod (bool nonPublic);

    Parameters

    • nonPublic
      Boolean

      true to include non-public accessors.

    Returns

    • MethodInfo

      The set accessor for this property.

  • GetValue(Object,BindingFlags,Binder,Object[],CultureInfo)

    Gets the value of the external COM property by using the COMMemberInfo that was specified to the crosoft.JScript.COMPropertyInfo.Initialize* method.

    public override object GetValue (object obj, System.Reflection.BindingFlags invokeAttr, System.Reflection.Binder binder, object[] index, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);

    Parameters

    • obj
      Object

      The object whose property value you want to get. This parameter is ignored.

    • invokeAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control the binding.

    • binder
      Binder

      An object that converts the type from actual argument type to formal argument type.

    • index
      Object[]

      The argument list to pass to the external COM property.

    • culture
      CultureInfo

      Provides information about a specific culture or locale. Used to format numbers, dates, and strings correctly.

    Returns

    • Object

      The value of the external COM property.

  • Initialize(String,COMMemberInfo)

    Initializes the information that enables JScript to communicate with this external COM property.

    public void Initialize (string name, Microsoft.JScript.COMMemberInfo dispatch);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the external COM property that this object represents.

    • dispatch
      COMMemberInfo

      Information that enables JScript to access the external COM property.

  • IsDefined(Type,Boolean)

    Determines whether the specified attribute type is attached to this property.

    public override bool IsDefined (Type t, bool inherit);

    Parameters

    • t
      Type

      The attribute type to search for.

    • inherit
      Boolean

      true to search this member's inheritance hierarchy to find the attributes.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      false in all cases.

  • SetValue(Object,Object,BindingFlags,Binder,Object[],CultureInfo)

    Sets the value of the external COM property by using the COMMemberInfo that was specified to the crosoft.JScript.COMPropertyInfo.Initialize* method.

    public override void SetValue (object obj, object value, System.Reflection.BindingFlags invokeAttr, System.Reflection.Binder binder, object[] index, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);

    Parameters

    • obj
      Object

      The object whose property value will be set. This parameter is ignored.

    • value
      Object

      The new value of the external COM member.

    • invokeAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control the binding.

    • binder
      Binder

      An object that converts the type from actual argument type to formal argument type.

    • index
      Object[]

      The argument list to pass to the external COM property.

    • culture
      CultureInfo

      Provides information about a specific culture or locale. Used to format numbers, dates, and strings correctly.
